attributes.action: Select the Lords randomly from the Electoral register
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Upper House should be randomly selected on a constituency basis, 4-yearly, from the electoral register (excluding eg murderers, & certain sex and race offenders).

Jurors would deal with such issues as MP's pay and Party Funding, take petitions and revise legislation

Jurors would be chosen for 8 years - 2 years of training, 2 in Parliament, 2 teaching and developing, 2 in Paliament. They would be trained to spot rhetoric & to avoid corruption, as well as the basics of statistics, economics, psychology (&the criticism of them).

A Senate and Judges would advise Jurors.

This would cost about £300 million annually

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
